WorkItem.Description:
Hi Laurent,
I have started to discover this great toolkit some days before. Now I wanted to switch to VS Express 2012 for Windows Desktop. Is there a chance to get an appropriate installer? Or simply a hint what to copy where?
Thanks in advance.
Sebastian
WorkItem.PlannedForRelease: MVVM Light Toolkit V4.1 for Visual Studio 2012
WorkItem.Summary: Support for VS Express 2012 for Windows Desktop

Comments.Message:
Hi,

Working on a new installer that will cover VS12 for Windows too.

Thanks
Laurent
V4.1 released last week supports Visual Studio Express for Desktop.
